channel.title: I found my old server files but can't connect?
channel.description:
So i found my old server files from 2010 and I cant seem to get them working.
Firstly, I can't find the original client I used for the server. It was called BrokenX. So im using a clean client I found.
Secondly, when I dont run the server I get "error connecting to server" but when I DO run the server I get "No response to login server"
If anyone can help me out that would be nice! The server download for the files are down below, test them out and see if you can get them working.
http://upx.nz/QauD41 - 317
